>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
>>[0] From module: MY TITLE
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <style-options jurisdiction-preference="simple"/>
  </locale>
  <macro name="juris-title">
    <text variable="title"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <text macro="juris-title"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
   {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "jurisdiction": "us:ak",
        "title": "My Title",
        "type": "legal_case"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
